name: Drunk Wizard
description:
This game was a submission for Ludum Dare 51
As a powerful wizard, you have an onslaught of unstoppable spells at your disposal! However in your current drunken state, your not exactly at your full power.  Your only choice is to run from the army of goblins, while using the few spells you can remember to cast!

Use WASD to move, your mouse to aim, and right click, left click, and space to cast spells. Whenever a spell is cast, it goes on cool down for ten seconds, and then swaps to a different spell. Cast Wisely!

As a powerful wizard you can:
- Throw a water balloon, and leave a pool of goblin killing liquid
- Summon a demon, and trick the goblins into a deadly trap
- Charge with drunken fury,annihilating everything in your path
- Teleport anywhere, which can be recast to teleport back to where you came
- Summon a ferret, who loves eating goblins (Wish him a happy bday too!)
- Stop time, while gaining super speed and invincibilty
- Cast waves of bubbles, filled with soap lethal to dirty goblins
- Transform into a Giant, and smash anything below your feet
- Snap half of the universe, and create a more festive atmosphere
- Hail a storm of acorns, that transform into disgusting tree monsters

This game was made as part of Ludum Dare 51. The theme of every ten seconds inspired us to make a game where every move you have gets replaced with a new one after ten seconds.
